Bury's League One match against Barnsley has been postponed because of a waterlogged pitch at Gigg Lane.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Heavy rainfall overnight left the playing surface and surrounding areas under heavy water and a 10:00 GMT pitch inspection was called.
No new date has yet been set.
Several other north-west clubs have also had to cancel their Boxing Day fixtures following heavy rain, while the Met Office has issued a weather warning for parts of Lancashire.
For the latest on the Boxing Day postponements click here.
Summary:
